review: Is very easy to setup and use, I like format of recently viewed selections. This is what I have been looking for, to have all my amazon prime movies n shows easily accessible on my  larger screen tv.

review: I actually really enjoy having the fire stick! My only issue is that it freezes a lot. Luckily all you have to do is unplug it and plug it in again and it takes off. So for what we have and the cost it is a great investment. (Definitely a 5 star if they work out this kink!)

review: The only use i have found for this so far is the twitch.tv app.  If i did get it for $20 i would be very unhappy.  Hopefully they get some more useful apps on it in the future.  Until then i'll stick to my chromecast for most things.

review: Like the idea, but felt screwed over by Amazon when they started my free trial of Prime when I placed my order, not when I received my Fire stick 1 month later.  I had no opportunity to explore Prime before I have to buy it.  Netflix, and others, are happy to let me "try before I buy". Real disappointment in Amazon's treatment of a loyal customer.
